H0.text: Which female succeeded John Prescott as Deputy Leader of the Labour Party in June 2007. Yvette Cooper

H1.text: Which female succeeded John Prescott as Deputy Leader of the Labour Party in June 2007. Jacqui Smith

H2.text: Which female succeeded John Prescott as Deputy Leader of the Labour Party in June 2007. Tessa Jowell

H3.text: Which female succeeded John Prescott as Deputy Leader of the Labour Party in June 2007. Harriet Harman

A4.text: Harman was elected Deputy Leader of the Labour Party in a close contest on 24 June 2007, defeating Alan Johnson.

A5.text: Harman defeated five other candidates in the 2007 deputy leadership election, ultimately defeating health secretary Alan Johnson by a narrow margin.
